ruler: Queen Dannel ir’Wynarn (presumed dead); Prince Oargev ir’Wynarn (now in New Cyre)
characteristics: Cyre was the seat of the kings and queens of Galifar
By tradition, Cyre’s Princess Mishann had claim to the throne
Cyrans lost more than anyone else in the war and stood on the moral high ground
Some support Prince Oargev, while others want to cling to the past
lastWarSynopsis: Although there were no winners or losers in the Last Wary, Cyre was a definite loser
Cyre fought against: Darguun, Valenar, Breland (Early)
Cyre later allied themselves with Breland
